title: zac's bug

embed.description: Thanks for leaving a "Like" on the video as this really helps me out and continues to grow our amazing community! â˜º Thank you ðŸ’™ ðŸ”· THE BEST TEAMWORK EVER TO WIN WITH AFK ft.

body:
i am a zac player and i notice that sometimes zac's e will face to wrong direction.
during 3:44 to 3:50 this youtuber's mouse is clearly at the right direction. but after he press e, his e went to the different direction.
this bug has been seen for a long time. at first i though is my laptop problem but base from the video i think it is a bug.

replies.body: Funny, looks like his mouse courser was offscreen when it happened.  I wonder if he doesnt run the game in full screen.  May explain why it goes off in a seemingly random direction.

Help & Support is intended as a platform for us to help you resolve your technical issues. Bug reports go in the [Report a Bug board](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report).

Let me know if you have any questions.
